LanguageData.Melee_CarniButcherknife.label: 切肉刀
LanguageData.Melee_CarniButcherknife.description: 死肉活肉都容易切开的大菜刀。
LanguageData.Melee_CarniGardenScissors.label: 园艺剪刀
LanguageData.Melee_CarniPickax.label: 鹤嘴锄
LanguageData.Melee_CarniPickax.description: 协助不擅长土石作业的畸瘤的坚固工具。
LanguageData.Melee_CarniProd.label: 电牛棒
LanguageData.Melee_CarniProd.description: 用电驱赶家畜的工具，当然对牛以外的生物也有效。
